raw akas.title: La escuela del terror de Casper

akas: La escuela del terror de Casper World-wide (Spanish title)
akas from release info: La escuela del terror de Casper World-wide (Spanish title)

1.title: Monster Movie/Quacky Duck
1.plot: Monster Movie: Casper and Jimmy want to enter the Deedstown Horror Movie festival by making their own scary movie - after all, who better to make a monster movie then real monsters? Quacky Duck: A cute little plastic bath duck finds it way into Scare School. Everyone is horrified, it's FAR too cute!

2.title: Dopple Gangers/Totally Bats!
2.plot: Dopplegangers: The little monsters are excited because the headmasters have given them a special zapppy control device which can make them transform into anything. They demonstrate it by turning themselves into each other. Totally Bats!: A family of bats has taken residence in Jimmy's kitchen cupboard and eaten all the cookies.

3.title: Cappy's Mail Order Eyes/Pumpkinpal
3.plot: Cappy's Mail Order Eyes: Casper and his friends order some new eyes for Cappy's birthday present. Cappy's delighted until he pops them in and finds the world is TRULY horrifying. Pumpkin Pal: Poor old Pumkinhead. Thatch has been teasing him for having an 'imaginary friend'.

4.title: The Day the Professor Croaked/The Bellyache Mystery
4.plot: The Day the Professor Croaked: Professor Burns wants a day off. Casper tries to help by pretending that Mosshead's pet toad IS the professor, temporarily changed in form. A Potent Brew: Casper's uncle Stinky gets sucked into one of Jimmy's dad Graham's crazy monster catching gadgets - a tea pot - ALONGWITH Graham himself

5.title: The Potent Brew/Goodbye Jimmy
5.plot: The Bellyache Mystery: It appears that the Sea Monster has EATEN Quasi! Naughty seamonster... Goodbye Jimmy: Graham is fed up. He's convinced he'll never be a successful ghost catcher if they stay in Deedstown so the family start to make plans to move - to SCOTLAND!

6.title: Poltergeist Assignment/Little Dragon
6.plot: The Poltergeist Assignment: Today Frankegymteacher is teaching the Scare School kids the basics of telekinesis - the black art of moving objects around just by thinking about it. The Little Dragon: It's show and tell in science class. Rooting about in the Secret Attic Casper finds a dragon egg and brings it to Prof. Burns' class.

7.title: Haunting Smell/The Manor Has Disappeared
7.plot: A Haunting Smell: Casper's Uncle Stinky has started to stink just that extra bit TOO much. Fatso and Stretch just cannot stand Stinky's horrible smell for one single minute longer and they hatch a plan. The Manor has Disappeared: Casper's uncles are out of town and have left the little ghost to take care of the Manor.

8.title: Thatch My Idol/Monster Catcher
8.plot: Thatch My Idol: Casper has really had enough of seeing Thatch bully his friends so he sprays him with a perfume he found in his uncles' magic ointment box. The Monster Catcher: Casper has been given a mysterious compass which belonged to his ancestor Jasper the Jester.

9.title: Home Alone/I'm Not a Hero
9.plot: Home Alone: Casper is punished by the headmaster for having helped an old lady carry her shopping bags. That punishment? - Casper will have to carry all the teachers' bags on their upcoming annual trip in the Forbidden Forest. I'm not a Hero: During a scare assignment in Deedstown Casper can't resist rescuing a kitten that was about to fall from a tree.

10.title: Dream Team/Curse of the Ring
10.plot: Dream Team: Casper is at Jimmy's and bumps into Mister Bradley sleepwalking. It turns out that Mr Bradley is being haunted by a very VERY naughty Dream Ghost. Curse of the Ring: Casper finds a ring in the 'Secret Attic' and puts it on. Unfortunately, the ring won't come off and even starts to control Casper himself!

11.title: Cheese/Casper's New Friend
11.plot: Cheese!: Casper asks his uncle Stinky to fix Mantha's 'polaroid' camera - they've got a 'fear' test and she wanted to take photos of frightened things for the test. Casper's New Friend: Casper accidentally frees ''Goo The Giggling Ghoul'' from a vial in the science lab. Goo's a super friendly ghost who races off to wreak (friendly) havoc in Deedstown.

12.title: Sweet Dreams/Typewriter from Hell
12.plot: Sweet Dreams: Thatch is up to no good. He's SO desperate to win the grading trophy that he's putting everyone to sleep - even the teachers! - in a sneaky plan to get great grades for himself. Typewriter from Hell: Casper has a paper to write for class, but with his computer broken he has to borrow an old fashioned typewriter from his uncles.

13.title: Mad-Dog McSneer/Our Boy Wolfie
13.plot: Mad Dog McSneer: All the Scare School students have to do a presentation on a famous figure of the Underworld, and Casper ends up having to present the famous Wailing Mad Dog McSneer in person! Our Boy Wolfie: A misunderstanding leads Jimmy's parents to believe that their son has turned into a werewolf, and Wolfie ends up taking Jimmy's place in the Bradley family.

14.title: Ghost Writer/Ghost Magnet
14.plot: Ghost Writer: Casper and Jimmy's favourite scary stories author is in Deedstown to sign his latest book. He admits to them that he's got writer's block and will never ever write another one!! The Ghost Magnet: Graham has created a ghost magnet that is supposed to attract ghosts so that he can catch them more easily!

15.title: Invasion of the Bog Monsters/Now You See Me Now You Don't
15.plot: Invasion of the Bog Monsters: Casper has built a special whistle to attract bats, but when he tries to test the whistle, Bog Monsters from all over the Forbidden Forest are attracted to Scare School by its sound. Now you see me, Now you don't: Casper is messing about in class and making fun of Ra in class by turning invisible.

16.title: Love Potion/Stage Fright
16.plot: Love Potion: The little monsters are in 'POTION CLASS', concocting new and untried potions with professor Burns. Casper accidently tries to brighten things up and ends up with a bright pink potion that put the fear into Prof Burns. Stage Fright: The Scare School students are getting ready to stage a play, but there's a problem: Dummy Girl has disappeared!

17.title: Substitute Gargoyle/Ship in a Bottle
17.plot: Substitute Gargoyle: Casper accidentally breaks a Gargoyle's ear, and the Gargoyle jumps on the opportunity by faking so he doesn't have to work anymore! Ship in a Bottle: Casper has built a model of Cappy's ship inside a bottle for a school competition.

18.title: Jack Out of the Box/Casper Meets Super Choc
18.plot: Jack out of the Box: Jimmy asks Casper to come to a toy swap in town and Casper brings a jack-in-a-box that he's found in the Scare School attic. Casper Meets Super Choc: A spaceship has crashed in the Forbidden Forest! A strange little boy wearing a mask comes out of it and introduces himself to Casper.

19.title: Frankengymteacher's Monster/Radio Blodge
19.plot: Frankengymteacher's Monster: Frankengymteacher is overloaded with work, so he decides to build a clone to help him out. Radio Blodge: Casper and Blodge get caught after using Alder & Dash's office microphone to bring BLODGE's lifetime dream to reality - being a D.J!

20.title: Davey Jone's Locker/Save Graham
20.plot: Davey Jones Locker: In gym class, Thatch humiliates Casper by beating him in a duel. Save Graham: While chasing Thatch, Graham manages to capture himself with his own equipment so Thatch brings all the equipment, including Graham, back to Scare School.

21.title: Black Cat/Jimmy the Ghost
21.plot: The Black Cat: Jimmy has had enough of his bully Norman, so he and Casper decide to teach Norman a lesson and get him over to the Manor for some REAL scaring. Jimmy The Ghost: A magic lantern that Casper finds in the Manor, turns Jimmy into a ghost.

22.title: Woodward's Day Out/Calc the Cameleon
22.plot: Woodward's Day Out: While visiting Cappy the Pirate, Casper learns that Woodward, the figurehead from Cappy's Galleon, has disappeared during a storm above Deedstown. Casper and Jimmy go looking for him throughout the city and start to uncover the strange path Woodward has taken, but will they rescue Woodward before he's mistaken for fire-wood? Calc The Cameleon: Casper, who causes Calculizard to lose his tail, finds him a new one in the Secret Attic. However this new tail is very special - in fact it's charmed - as it comes from a camelemonster and has the power to ...

23.title: Fearless Freddie/Triclops Mistress of Dark
23.plot: Fearless Freddie: The Bedroom Scare Competition is about to begin and each little monster is assigned a different fleshie house. Triclops Mistress Of Darkness: Triclops is being bullied by Thatch and his cronies, but she doesn't have the guts to fight back.

24.title: The Great Screamboard Disgrace/Jimmy's Truck Call
24.plot: The Great Screamboard Disgrace: One of the most exciting events in Scare School history, The Great Screamboard Race, is about to start at Scare School. Jimmy's Trunk Call: Jimmy's going camping with the scouts so Casper decides to loan him his uncles' trunk without asking their permission first.

25.title: To Catch a Monster/No Bones About
25.plot: To Catch A Monster: Everybody's disappearing one by one at Scare School and Casper is getting increasingly worried. No Bones About It: There's a big game going on in the Underworld and the Scare School has selected Mickey as its representative.

26.title: Last Dance/Mummy's Boy
26.plot: The Last Dance: The annual school dance, the Monster Mash, is approaching and Mantha is really nervous because she hasn't got anything to wear. Mummy's Boy: Ra's been bragging to his parents that he has a great school report and they're so pleased that they're coming to visit him.

1.title: Fang Decay/Scare Day
1.plot: Fang Decay: Why is Thatch acting meaner than usual? He has a fang-ache! / Scare Day: Mantha is determined to become the first zombie ever to win the Super BooâZ¯Scare School's ultimate scaring competition.

2.title: Disarmed and Dangerous/Frankenleftovers
2.plot: Disarmed and Dangerous: When Mantha's arm falls off, her replacement limb turns out to be a monstrous tentacle! / Frankenleftovers: Casper gets a seemingly impossible class assignment--to create life!

3.title: Bully for You/The Ra-Minator
3.plot: Bully For You: When Casper decides he can't take any more of Thatch's nastiness, he forms a secret squad dedicated to putting an end to bullying. / The Ra-minator: Using the power of invisibility, Casper offers to help transform Ra from a sports zero to an athletic hero.

4.title: Weekend at Bunny's/Grimly Day
4.plot: Weekend at Bunny's: Alder and Dash sound the alarm after a terrifying creature threatens Scare School. / Grimly Day: It's Grimly DayâZ¯the grimmest day of the year!

5.title: Accidental Hero/Rich Kid Ra
5.plot: Accidental Hero: In order to win the Fright Stuff Award, Casper consults his uncles for scaring advice. / Rich Kid Ra: When Ra pulls up to Scare School in a solid gold chariot, everyone suddenly wants to be his best friend.

6.title: Dragon Quest/Opposite Day
6.plot: Dragon Quest: The unlucky staff of a medieval-themed restaurant in Deedstown, get an unfriendly visit from Professor Thurdigree Burns. / Opposite Day: When Wolfie's experiment with moonlight goes awry, everyone but Casper turns into his or her opposite.

7.title: Scare Scouts/Boo!
7.plot: Scare Scouts: When Frankengymteacher forms a scout troop, Casper is the first to sign up. / Boo: During a visit to Deedstown, Casper and his friends are shocked to find the humans dressed as scary creatures...it must Halloween!

8.title: Abra-Ca-Deedstown/Shrinky Dust
8.plot: Abra-Ca-Deedstown: From cleaning Ra's sarcophagus, to starring in Jimmy's magic act, Casper has been helping so much, he's exhausted. / Shrinky Dust: When magical Shrinky Dust falls into Norman the bully's hands, Casper and Jimmy find themselves on a hunt to get it back.

9.title: Bands on the Run/Vote for Casper
9.plot: Bands on the Run: Casper and Jimmy form a rock band to compete in the Deedstown Battle of the Bands. / Vote for Casper: Mantha is angling to win the office of Class Rep, but Kibosh fancies having a fellow ghost in power.

10.title: Permission Impossible/What Possessed You?
10.plot: Permission Impossible: When Ra's parents refuse to let him go on the school camping trip, he sneaks away and gets lost in the Scary Woods with Casper and Mantha. / What Possessed You: When a lesson in taking possession of a human body goes awry, Casper's human ends up taking possession of him!

11.title: Ghost Bust a Move/My Fair Harpy
11.plot: Ghostbust a Move: When Jimmy's dad decides to move the family away from Deedstown, Casper and his friends vow to stop Mr. Bradley from selling their house. / My Fair Harpy: The Winter Chill Dance is coming up and Ra is determined to be king.

12.title: Fleshed Out/Messy Business at the Manor
12.plot: Fleshed Out: Wolfie wakes up one morning to every creature's nightmareâZ¯he's turned into a human! / Messy Business At The Manor: When Mosshead has nowhere to go for vacation, Casper invites him to stay at his uncles' house...where he quickly discovers that Mosshead is the world's worst houseguest.

13.title: Paramedic Paranormal/Back to Ghoul
13.plot: Paramedic Paranormal: When Jimmy breaks out in hives, Casper and his friends have no choice but to bring him to the human hospital. / Back To Ghoul: When Casper's uncles Stinky, Fatso and Stretch decide to go back to Scare School, Casper is thrilled.

14.title: 2500 Candles for Ra/It's a Mad Mad Mad Underworld
14.plot: 2500 Candles for Ra: Upset that no one remembered his birthday, Ra goes to hang out with the mummies at the Deedstown museum. / It's a Mad, Mad, Mad Underworld: When Casper finds Cappy's old treasure map, he promises to help the pirate find his lost fortune.

15.title: Curse of the Sandwich/A Real Little Monster
15.plot: Curse of the Sandwich: After Ra accidentally bites into Thatch's sandwich, he becomes convinced that he's turning into a vampire. / Real Little Monster: When Norman the bully comes after Jimmy, Casper helps his human friend hide in the one place he knows Norman won't look--Scare School.

16.title: Curse of the Sarcophagus/Whiz Kid Ra
16.plot: Curse of the Sarcophagus: Ra throws out the instruction manual for his new high-tech Sarcophagus without reading it first. / Whiz Kid Ra: When Ra secretly uses the all-knowing Answertorium to ace a test, he earns a reputation for having all the answers.

17.title: Demension Demented/Taming of the Gloutch
17.plot: Dimension Demented: When Ra tries to bring a jukebox to school by stuffing it into the Dimension Tube, he ends up sending himself on a terrifying inter-dimensional journey. / The Taming of The Gloutch: Gloutch raising--a test all Scare School students must take--involves raising a cute, adorable creature into a terrifying monster.

18.title: Ring My Bell/First Mate Casper
18.plot: Ring My Bell: When Casper encourages Quasi to go on strike from his thankless job as chore boy, Alder and Dash make Casper take his place. / First Mate Casper: When Cappy needs a first mate, Casper's the only one who's up to the challenge.

19.title: Power Outage Part 1: A Powerful Foe/Power Outage Part 2: Razznik's Revenge
19.plot: Power Outage - Part 1: A Powerful Foe: When Scare School falls victim to the Baccora, Kibosh encourages the students to work together, setting booby-traps and building defences. / Power Outage - Part 2: Razznik's Revenge: Creature by creature, the evil entity, Baccora, robs Scare School of its powers and locks them into a magical cleptor.

20.title: Power Outage Part 3: Escape from Scare School/Power Outage Part 4: The Final Battle
20.plot: Power Outage - Part 1: A Powerful Foe: When Scare School falls victim to the Baccora, Kibosh encourages the students to work together, setting booby-traps and building defences. / Power Outage - Part 2: Razznik's Revenge: Creature by creature, the evil entity, Baccora, robs Scare School of its powers and locks them into a magical cleptor.

21.title: Ghost in the Gallery/Wart on the Nose
21.plot: Ghost in the Gallery: After hearing reports of a ghost stealing artwork from the Deedstown Museum, Casper becomes convinced that his uncles are involved. / Wart on the Nose: When Professor Thurdigree Burns comes down with dragon flu, Casper, Mantha and Ra are tasked with finding a cure.

22.title: Revenge of the Creature Catcher/Slugby
22.plot: Revenge of the Creature Catcher: Casper, Mantha and Ra accidentally lead Jimmy's father to the underworld, where he's captured and taken hostage. / Slugby: To prove that the teachers haven't gone soft, Alder and Dash stage a staff vs. students Slugby match.

23.title: You Oughta Be in Pictures/Crypt Critters
23.plot: You Oughta Be in Pictures: When Mantha sees a Deedstown mob attacking a group of fellow zombies, she's determined to lead them in a counterattack. / Crypt Critters: Mantha comes down with an embarrassing case of crypt critters, but refuses to go to the nurse.

24.title: The Reflesherator/Master Blister
24.plot: The Reflesherator: When Professor Burns requires a substitute teacher, Flyboy's dad volunteers for the job. / Master Blister: The students of Scare School are thrilled after a prank played on Alder and Dash results in their firing.

25.title: Casper the Matchmaker/Jimmy Bradley: Creature Catcher
25.plot: Casper, the Match Maker: When Frankengymteacher gets extra crabby, the kids realize he's secretly in love with their history teacher, Hedy. / Jimmy Bradley: Creature Catcher:On "take your kid to work day," Jimmy's dad invites him to tag along as a junior ghost catcher.

26.title: Merry Scary Christmas/Time Waits for No Ghost
26.plot: Merry Scary Christmas: It's Christmas and Casper wants to spend the holiday with his human pal, Jimmy. / Time Waits for No Ghost: When Casper discovers a clock that can stop time, everyone wants to use it for his or her own purpose.

imdb.title: Casper's Scare School
plot: Casper (the good ghost) with his friend tries to finish "scare school". But in order to do so he need to scare people (which is against his nature) along the way Casper and friends goes through many mysteries and adventures.
